channel.title: Help with client
channel.description: Hey guys, I recently made a server and relized really the only good servers are with client (317) so when i download a source and client, i know what to do with the source blah blah, but with the client, i go into client.java and change the no-ip to mine? is that all? like how do people download the client ? when ive changed to my no-ip to i make it a .rar file then upload it? please help if you can, thanks for reading

item.title: Help with client
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

and the port sometimes. but ya thats it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with client
item.dc:creator: @highonskills highonskills
item.description:
@highonskills wrote:

ok thanks, now correct me if im wrong is the only thing you have to change in your client.java for the client part, is it the ip

Read full topic

item.title: Help with client
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

make it a zip or w/e u use and upload it through

http://uppit.com/

or

http://www.mediafire.com/

then post the link that will be generated for you so that people can download your client when you post your server so ppl can dl it and login.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with client

item.description:
